header.survey_title: Foundational Digital Transformation in North-East Romania
header.survey_description:
This research study aims to investigate the effectiveness of a Smart Specialisation program in rigorously evaluating the adoption of digital technologies by SMEs in Romania's North-East region.  
The program is designed to provide financial assistance to eligible SMEs, facilitating their acquisition of ICT hardware, development or adaptation of software applications/licenses, acquisition of AI systems, website development, and enhancement of IT infrastructure.  
By comparing randomly selected program firms and non-selected comparison firms, we seek to establish causal relationships between digitalization and its corresponding outcomes, while also distinguishing the effects for various types of firms.  
Non-refundable financial support will be provided to eligible SMEs, with a maximum project contribution of 90% of the eligible investment value.  
Total financial allocation of EUR 51.4 milions and is carried out by launching calls for projects (min 15.000 EUR, max 100.000 EUR per firm).  
The focus is on increasing digital intensity, supporting the use of digital tools, equipment, and services by creating internet pages, digital promotion, cloud hosting services, e-commerce, digitalization of communication with clients, data collection, buying ICT hardware, and developing or adapting software applications/licenses.

The first 7 following questions regard your beliefs on, what is called in technical terms, the intention-to-treat effect (ITT). It is the effect of BEING OFFERED the full program, regardless of whether or not a firm decides to participate. It is simply the mean difference of the outcomes for the 100 firms that get the financial assistance to get digitalized, compared to the 100 firms that do not.
You will be asked what you think it is the likely impact of the program for the firms that are offered the intervention, compared to those that do not participate to the program. 

The last 3 questions are based on the Digital Economy and Society Index (DESI) score, that endeavors to capture the degree to which a company is digitized.  
The DESI score is therefore created by taking the sum of DESI indicators that are met by a given company. Since there are 12 DESI indicators, the DESI score has the maximum value of 12.
You will be asked what you think it is the likely impact on the DESI Score for the firms that are offered the intervention, compared to those that do not participate to the program.

question1.subtitle_question: Consider that 100 eligible companies have been selected to participate to the Smart Specialisation program. What percentages of firms do you think will enroll in the program? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question1.effect_size: What would be the minimum take-up rate you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the take-up rate to be at least 60%, you should give 60 as your answer.

question2.subtitle_question: How much do you think that the digitalization grant has increased the total number of full-time employees on average in the SMEs that were offered the intervention compared to the companies that did not receive it in the first 6 months since firms started their implementation? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question2.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the number of employees to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question3.subtitle_question: How much do you think that the digitalization grant has increased the labor productivity on average in the SMEs that were offered the intervention, compared to the SMEs that did not receive it, in the first 6 months since firms started their implementation? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question3.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the productivity to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question4.subtitle_question: How much do you think that the digitalization grant has increased the total annual sales revenue on average in the SMEs that were offered the intervention, compared to the companies that did not receive it in the first 6 months since firms started their implementation? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question4.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the output levels to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question5.subtitle_question:
**Considering ONLY SMEs that ALREADY exported outside Romanian borders before the intervention.**  
How much do you think that SMEs that benefit from the digitalization grant have increased the export levels in European Union or in the worldwide market on average, compared to SMEs that did not receive it in the first 6 months since firms started their implementation? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question5.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the export to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question6.subtitle_question:
**Considering ONLY SMEs that have NEVER exported outside Romanian borders before the intervention.**  
How many SMEs that benefited from the digitalization grant you think that would start exporting in European Union or in the worldwide market on average, compared to the firms that did not receive it in the first 6 months since firms started their implementation? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question6.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the percentage of SMESs starting exporting to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question7.subtitle_question: How much do you think that the digitalization grant has impacted the annual profit on average in the SMEs that were offered the intervention compared to the companies that did not receive it in the first 6 months since firms started their implementation? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question7.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the annual profit to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question8.subtitle_question:
**Considering ONLY SMEs that have NEVER used an e-commerce service before the intervention.**  
How much would the DESI Score increase many SMEs that benefited from the digitalization grant you think would start selling products online through an e-commerce on average, compared to the firms that did not receive it in the first 6 months since firms started their implementation? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question8.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the number of SMESs using e-commerce to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question9.subtitle_question:
**Considering ONLY SMEs that have NEVER used electronic invoices before the intervention.**  
How many SMEs that benefited from the digitalization grant you think would start using electronic invoices on average, compared to the firms that did not receive it in the first 6 months since firms started their implementation? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question9.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the number of SMESs using electronic invoices to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question10.subtitle_question:
**Considering ONLY SMEs that have NEVER used electronic invoices before the intervention.**  
How many SMEs that benefited from the digitalization grant you think would start using digital advertising on average, compared to the firms that did not receive it in the first 6 months since firms started their implementation? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question10.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the number of SMESs using digital advertising to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.
